page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION.
page.content: In the area we have Wootton Wood, Akeman street farm, Blenheim Palace Great Park and the northern part of Combe. Other farmhouses in our area are part of Akeman St. Farm. Our area is mostly made up of arable farm land, parks and woods. Akeman street runs right across our area. Akeman street is an old roman road which runs close to the site of a Roman villa. Most of the people in our area live either in farm houses or in the north end of Combe.Some of them live on Blenheim Estate, in the lodges as workers. Blenheim Palace is the family home of the Marlboroughs and whilst the palace itself is not in our area the estate takes up about half of our 12 sq.Km.
